scripts.check: npm run prepare && npm run lint && ng test --no-watch --no-progress --browsers=ChromeHeadlessCI
scripts.publish:ng-api-service: ng build ng-api-service && rm -rf ./node_modules/@codegena/ng-api-service && cp -R ./dist/ng-api-service ./node_modules/@codegena/ng-api-service && npm run check && npm version patch && cd ./dist/ng-api-service && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:oapi3ts: ng build oapi3ts && rm -rf ./node_modules/@codegena/oapi3ts && cp -R ./dist/oapi3ts ./node_modules/@codegena/oapi3ts && npm run check && npm version patch && cd ./dist/oapi3ts && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:oapi3ts-cli: ng build oapi3ts-cli && rm -rf ./node_modules/@codegena/oapi3ts-cli && cp -R ./dist/oapi3ts-cli ./node_modules/@codegena/oapi3ts-cli && npm run check && npm version patch && cd ./dist/oapi3ts-cli && npm version patch && npm publish
